price: 145. Je ne vous réclame pour cela aucune récompense, car ma récompense ne relève que du Seigneur de l’Univers.
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
